txt.en: You demand to know the meaning of this insult
Follow Khôltekh to the entrance of Umbar-môkh
TBD - Blah!
Gadâr has sworn to protect you. You should stay close to him.
Jaith has entered Dâr Laja with information about what transpires in the city.
'TBD - Blah!'
TBD - Blah!
Your guards have left Dâr Laja to prevent the uprising from entering the Meeting-hall and doing you some harm. You should return to the main hall and stay away from the entrance!
Khôltekh motions for you to speak to him.
'TBD - Blah!'
'You are too valuable to kill,' Khôltekh says. 'Carry her, boys.'
'TBD - Blah!'
The catacombs of Umbar-môkh may allow you to flee the uprising and escape to safety!
Khôltekh has led you into Umbar-môkh, through which you must find safety!
'TBD - Blah!'
Khôltekh hopes to lead you through Umbar-môkh to safety!
Khôltekh beckons you to the safety of the main hall
Temámir soldiers bar your passage.
'TBD - Blah!'
Temámir soldiers bar your passage.
Flee through Umbar-môkh to safety!
Khôltekh had better have an explanation for this insult!
Talk to Khôltekh in Umbar-môkh
'TBD - Blah!'
Follow Khôltekh through Umbar-môkh to safety
TBD - Blah!
Talk to the Temámir guardsman barring your passage
Temámir soldiers bar your passage
'We should slip the net they have fashioned for us, Hármelak.'
Talk to Khôltekh and demand an explanation
'Let us escape through Umbar-môkh!'
'Through here.'
Walk to the northern waggons or defy Khôltekh by standing your ground
'This way!'
'The way is blocked!'
'My people will stall them!'
'We cannot go this way.'
The fate of some members of the Kindred of the Coins remain a mystery, and for now can only be guessed at by wondering minds.
Guard-captain Gadâr stands prepared to defend you within Dâr Laja.
'Keep your dignity, Hármelak. Walk to the waggons and live.'
'Stay here and die.'
'What is happening out there?'
Khôltekh nods in the direction of the waggons to the north.
'This way, my Lady. I will keep you safe!'
'It is getting unruly.'
'Stay back, my Lady.'
'Gadâr, I need you outside!'
'Jaith! What is happening outside?'
'Stay here, my Lady. They will not get by us!'
Talk to Gadâr within Dâr Laja
Follow Gadâr and remain under his protection
Talk to Jaith inside Dâr Laja
Return to the safety of the main hall of Dâr Laja
Talk to Khôltekh in the main hall of Dâr Laja
Instance: Flight of the TBD
